DOC.brief_summary: The goal R21 exploratory pilot feasibility study : 1 ) design Internet-based self-management intervention adolescent type 1 diabetes ; 2 ) test intervention small randomize trial establish technical feasibility , intervention acceptability , competence complete necessary recruitment research procedure . Although powered detect statistically significant change , possible outcome study include improvement problem-solving , cop , self-management behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Adolescent Self-Management Type 1 Diabetes : Intervention ( Completed )
DOC.criteria: diagnose least 6 month , age 1317 ; Internet access , parental consent Any sensory deficit would preclude see hearing .
